sections.heading: Purpose of this screen
body: The Profile screen is the central place to manage account information, notification preferences, application settings, and support options.
It allows the user to control both personal data and how the Flovers app behaves on a daily basis.

sections.heading: Account
body: The Account section displays basic account information such as the registered email address and account creation date.
From this section, the user can change the email address (confirmation with the current password is required), change the current password, log out, or permanently delete the account.
Deleting the account results in irreversible removal of all user data, including plants, reminders, tasks, readings, and devices.

sections.heading: Notifications
body: The Notifications section allows the user to manage consent and preferences for email and push notifications.

For both email and push notifications, the user can enable or disable two notification types: a daily summary informing whether there are tasks due today, and a reminder notification sent if tasks remain outstanding 24 hours after the first notification.
For each notification type, the user selects the time of delivery (full-hour format, e.g. 14:00).

sections.heading: Settings
body: The Settings section controls general application behavior and appearance.

Available options include language selection, date and time format, temperature units (Celsius, Fahrenheit, Kelvin), measurement units (metric or imperial), and Floating Action Button (FAB) position (left or right).
The user can also customize the app appearance by selecting a background image, tile theme (light or dark), and tile transparency level.

sections.heading: Support
body: The Support section provides direct access to assistance from the Flovers team.
The user can contact support for help or report a bug directly from this screen.
Reporting issues helps improve the stability and quality of the application.
